Name: Pembrey
About the game: PLAY MY NEWEST GAME, CARRIER TRAIL! / Pembrey is a narrative, horror, mystery game set in the United Kingdom. Two young film makers travel out deep into the Pembrey Forest in search for footage for their documentary. Record and document your findings and unravel the truth behind the famous 'Pembrey Forest'. Navigate through the large forest and pray not to get lost along the way. Don't wander too far from camp however, you may see something you'll regret... The winding forest is easy to get lost in however. During the game, you will experience being lost in the middle of the woods. You will feel like you're going in circles, but are you really? That is the fear this game strives to achieve. Record unique things in the environment to improve your film. Document horrific, beautiful, or interesting things. Will you have enough proof to convince everyone else of what actually lies in the woods?
